Rodin Eckenroth / Getty Images'' Big Little Lies'' actress Shailene Woodley portrays real - life sailor Tami Oldham Ashcraft in the new movie ` ` Adrift.'' Released on June 1, the film is inspired by true events experienced by Ashcraft and her husband when they were caught in a storm on their yacht. When Ashcraft's husband was left incapacitated by the struggles of life on the open sea, Ashcraft was forced to sail them both 700 miles across the ocean to get to the nearest land.
